def listP( P ):

    print ''
for testcases in xrange(int(raw_input() ) ) :
    n = int(raw_input() )
    Given = map(int, raw_input().split() )
    SG = sorted(Given)
    mid = (n / 2) if n % 2 == 0 else (n+1)/2
    top = SG[:mid] 
    bottom = SG[mid:]
    #print SG, top, bottom
    for i in xrange( len(top)) :
        Given[2*i] = top[i]
        if ( 2*i < n - 1 ) :
            Given[(2*i)+1] = bottom[i]
    listP(Given)
